LITURGY.Comment: No Divine Liturgy UNLESS It is Meeting of the LORD
Divine Liturgy of St John for Meeting of the LORD

TROPARION.Header: Troparion of the Prophecy in the 8th Tone

SEXTE.TROPARION: HELP US IN OUR SORROW, LORD, AND SAVE US, LOVER OF MANKIND, BORN OF THE VIRGIN

PROKEIMENON.Header: First Prokeimenon of the Prophecy in the 1st Tone

SEXTE.PROKEIMENON: Let your mercy, Lord, be upon us
as we have set our hope on You!
SEXTE.STICHOS: Rejoice in the Lord, you righteous! Praise befits the just!

PROKEIMENON.Header: Second Prokeimenon of the Prophecy in the 3rd Tone

SEXTE.PROKEIMENON: Sing praises to our God, Sing praises!
Sing praises to our King, sing praises!
SEXTE.STICHOS: Clap your hands, all peoples! Shout to God with loud songs of joy!
